SEARCH
Package org.marjoriekohn.diningreview.service

Class ReviewService

java.lang.Object
org.marjoriekohn.diningreview.service.ReviewService
@Service public class ReviewService extends Object
Manages operations related to Review entities. This class provides a set of methods for creating, reading, and updating reviews. It interacts with the ReviewRepository, UserRepository, and RestaurantRepository to perform these operations. Client-facing methods use ReviewDTO to ensure separation of concerns between the database entity and the client-side data structure.
See Also:
  • ReviewRepository
  • UserRepository
  • RestaurantRepository
  • ReviewDTO
  • Review

  • Constructor Details

    • ReviewService

      @Autowired public ReviewService(ReviewRepository reviewRepository, UserRepository userRepository, RestaurantRepository restaurantRepository)

  • Method Details

    • createReview

      public ReviewDTO createReview(ReviewDTO reviewDTO)
      Creates a new review for a specific restaurant by a user. This method utilizes a ReviewDTO to collect review details, validates the associated user and restaurant, and then saves the review to the database. Note: a user cannot review the same restaurant multiple times.
      Parameters:
      reviewDTO - the Data transfer object containing review details, required
      Returns:
      the newly created review's DTO
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user associated with the review is not found
      RestaurantNotFoundException - if the restaurant associated with the review is not found
      UnauthorizedAccessException - if the user has already reviewed the restaurant
      See Also:
      • convertDTOToEntity(ReviewDTO)
      • convertEntityToDTO(Review)
      • UserRepository.findByUsername(String)
      • ReviewRepository.findByUserAndRestaurant(User, Restaurant)

    • getPendingReviews

      public List<ReviewDTO> getPendingReviews()
      Retrieves a list of all reviews that are pending approval. This method fetches reviews with a 'PENDING' status from the database and returns them as a list of ReviewDTOs. An exception is thrown if no pending reviews are found.
      Returns:
      a list of ReviewDTOs representing pending reviews
      Throws:
      ReviewNotFoundException - if no reviews are pending approval
      See Also:
      • convertEntityToDTO(Review)
      • ReviewRepository.findByStatus(Review.Status)

    • getApprovedReviews

      public List<ReviewDTO> getApprovedReviews(Long restaurantId)
      Retrieves a list of all approved reviews for a specific restaurant. Fetches reviews with an 'APPROVED' status for a given restaurant and returns them as a list of ReviewDTOs. Exceptions are thrown if the restaurant or approved reviews are not found.
      Parameters:
      restaurantId - the unique ID of the restaurant, required
      Returns:
      a list of ReviewDTOs representing approved reviews
      Throws:
      RestaurantNotFoundException - if no restaurant with the provided ID exists
      See Also:
      • convertEntityToDTO(Review)
      • ReviewRepository.findByRestaurantAndStatus(Restaurant, Review.Status)

    • updateReviewStatus

      public ReviewDTO updateReviewStatus(AdminReviewAction adminReviewAction)
      Updates the approval status of a review. Takes an AdminReviewAction object that contains the review ID and desired action status, then updates the review's status to either 'APPROVED' or 'REJECTED'.
      Parameters:
      adminReviewAction - contains the review ID and the desired action status, required
      Returns:
      the updated review's DTO
      Throws:
      ReviewNotFoundException - if no review with the provided ID exists
      IllegalArgumentException - if an invalid action status is provided
      See Also:
      • convertEntityToDTO(Review)

    • convertEntityToDTO

      public ReviewDTO convertEntityToDTO(Review review)
      Transforms a Review entity into a ReviewDTO. This method converts the fields of a given Review entity into a ReviewDTO, facilitating the transfer of review data from the server to the client. The transformation ensures that only necessary data is exposed to the client.
      Parameters:
      review - The Review entity obtained from the database. This parameter is required.
      Returns:
      A ReviewDTO containing the details of the given Review entity.
      See Also:
      • convertDTOToEntity(ReviewDTO)
      • Review
      • ReviewDTO

    • convertDTOToEntity

      public Review convertDTOToEntity(ReviewDTO reviewDTO)
      Transforms a ReviewDTO into a Review entity. This method converts the fields of a given ReviewDTO into a Review entity, making it suitable for database operations. It associates the DTO fields with the corresponding database entity fields, enabling the persistence of client-provided review details to the database. The transformation does not allow the client to directly modify the review ID or status.
      Parameters:
      reviewDTO - the Data Transfer Object containing review details from the client-side, required
      Returns:
      a Review entity containing the details of the given ReviewDTO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided ReviewDTO is invalid or if it references non-existing users or restaurants
      See Also:
      • convertEntityToDTO(Review)
      • Review
      • ReviewDTO
